document_data.caption: A map showing Highrock in the Fairheight Range.
document_data.name: Highrock
document_data.mainbody: '''Highrock''' was a small mining town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Highrock was found in the far northeast corner of Callidyrr within the county of [[Fairheight]]. The town was within the [[Fairheight Range]] near the [[Farfair River]] close to the border with [[Gnarhelm]], making it the northernmost settlement in Callidyrr.
